com.objetdirect.tatami.client
Class Toaster

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
          com.objetdirect.tatami.client.AbstractDojo
              com.objetdirect.tatami.client.Toaster
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener, HasDojo
public class Toaster
extends AbstractDojo

This widget does display in a corner of a container some messages which disappear afetr a delay.

This is class is esay : a widget of type Toaster is created and attached - without be positioned - on the GWT widget. It is invisible. This widget have a property topic. When a message is publish doing a reference to this topic, it is presented by the Toaster.

The static methods publishXXX permit to publish the messages

We can create several toasters. Some of them can share the same topic. In this case, the message is shown in several places

Author:
Henry, Vianney

Constructor Detail

Toaster

public Toaster(java.lang.String messageTopic)
Creates the Toatser specifying the topic of the messages. The message will have the position BOTTOM_RIGHT_UP

Parameters:
messageTopic - the topic for the messages

Toaster

public Toaster(java.lang.String messageTopic,
               java.lang.String position)
Creates the Toaster at the specific position and with the specific topic.

Parameters:
messageTopic - the topic for the Toaster
position - position for the message to display. Availables values are BOTTOM_RIGHT_UP, BOTTOM_RIGHT_LEFT, BOTTOM_LEFT_UP, BOTTOM_LEFT_RIGHT TOP_RIGHT_DOWN, TOP_RIGHT_LEFT, TOP_LEFT_DOWN, TOP_LEFT_RIGHT

publishMessage

public static void publishMessage(java.lang.String topic,
                                  java.lang.String message)
Publishes a PLAIN type message on a specific topic. the delay is specify by the constant DELAY.

Parameters:
topic, - the topic for the message
message - the content of the message, can be some code HTML
See Also:

publish

public static void publish(java.lang.String topic,
                           java.lang.String message,
                           java.lang.String type,
                           int delay)
Publishes a message on a specific topic. All paramaters are requiered to specify the message.

Parameters:
topic - the topic for the message.
message - the content of the message. Can be some HTML code.
type - the type for the message. Possible values are : PLAIN_MESSAGE, WARNING_MESSAGE, ERROR_MESSAGE et FATAL_MESSAGE
delay - the delay for the message present to the screen in milliseconds
